quest.name: Timber for the Taking
journal:
 Quest Sync
Jaimbert needs a volunteer.
objectives: Gather stacks of seasoned timber at Top Rung.
Deliver the stacks of seasoned timber to Jaimbert.

dialogue.name: JAIMBERT
dialogue.text: Greetings, friend! I've a wee favor to ask if you can spare a moment.

dialogue.name: JAIMBERT
dialogue.text: Take a look around and tell me what you see. Aye! Rock, rock, and more bloody rock. Not a single tree. And that means no wood for houses.

dialogue.name: JAIMBERT
dialogue.text: Every once in a while the dwarves'll let us crawl through their “secret tunnels” to reach the lowlands, but cartin' logs up them narrow─not to mention steep─shafts is fool's work.

dialogue.name: JAIMBERT
dialogue.text: 'Specially when you consider all the timber what was left to rot at Top Rung. It's just lyin' there for the takin'...assumin' you've the stones to brave the gauntlet of nasties 'twixt here and there, of course. And I reckon you do!

dialogue.name: JAIMBERT
dialogue.text: Go on, lasslad─bring me a few stacks of timber, and I'll make it worth your while!

dialogue.name: JAIMBERT
dialogue.text: Oho! Either you've brought me some timber, or you're plannin' on buildin' yourself a cabin.

dialogue.name: JAIMBERT
dialogue.text: Thank you, lasslad─now I'll finally be able to get back to buildin'!

dialogue.name: JAIMBERT
dialogue.text: This wood you've brought me was sent up the Ladder back when the dwarves was more open to trade. Amity was neutral ground for strikin' deals, you see, and there was plans to expand the village once upon a time.

dialogue.name: JAIMBERT
dialogue.text: So I guess you can say we're usin' the timber for its intended purpose...even if it is a few years late! Fare you well, friend, and thanks again for the help!
